meanings.definition: A sturdy boot designed for heavy-duty work.
meanings.sent1: My dad wears his workboots when he fixes things around the house.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker put on his workboots before starting the project.
meanings.sent3: The workboots danced around the muddy puddles, trying to stay clean.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a pair of workboots, always ready for any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the workboots clunking on the pavement echoed through the empty street.

meanings.definition: Boots worn for protection and support during physical labor.
meanings.sent1: The farmer's workboots kept his feet safe while he worked in the fields.
meanings.sent2: She laced up her workboots before heading out to the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The workboots huddled together in the corner, tired after a long day's work.
meanings.sent4: His workboots were like loyal companions, always by his side during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The smell of leather from the workboots filled the room, a reminder of hard work.
